children.value: The events in this chapter can be binded or unbinded to graph by
The parameters of callbacks for common events, Node events, and Edge events are described in
Activated when mouse enters an item.
This is not a bubbled event
, which means this event will not be activated when the mouse moves to the descendant items.
Activated while the mouse is moving inside an item. It cannot be activated by keyboard.
Activated while the mouse moves out of an item.
Activated when the mouse moves over an item.
Activated when the mouse leaves an item.
This is not a bubbled event
, which means this event will not be activated when the mouse leaves the descendant items.
Activated when the left or right button is clicked down. It cannot be activated by keyboard.
Activated when the left or right button is released. It cannot be activated by keyboard.
Open the context menu when user clicks the right button of mouse.
Activated when user begins to drag. This event is applied on a dragged item.
Activated during the dragging process. This event is applied on a dragged item.
Activated when user stops dragging. This event is applied on a dragged item.
Activated when user drags an item into a target item. This event is applied on a dragged item.
Activated when user drags an item out of a target item. This event is applied on the target item.
Activated when user drops an item on a target item. This event is applied on the target item.
Activated when user presses down a button on keyboard.
Activated when user releases a button on keyboard.
Activated when a finger touches the screen. If there are fingers on the screen already, it will be activated too.
Activated during the processes of finger moving on the screen. Call preventDefault() to prevent scrolling.
Activated when a finger leaves the screen.
of the mouse on the node.
Activated when user double clicks the
of the mouse on the node.
Activated when the mouse enters the node.
Activated while the mouse is moving inside the node. It cannot be activated by keyboard.
Activated while the mouse moves out of the node.
Activated when the mouse moves over the node.
Activated when the mouse leaves the node.
Activated when the left or right button is clicked down on the node. It cannot be activated by keyboard.
Activated when the left or right button is released on the node. It cannot be activated by keyboard.
Open the context menu when user clicks the right button of mouse on the node.
Activated when user begins to drag the node. This event is applied on the dragged node.
Activated during the dragging process on the node. This event is applied on the dragged node.
Activated when user stops dragging on the node. This event is applied on the dragged node.
Activated when user drags the node into a target item. This event is applied on the dragged node.
Activated when user drags the node out of a target item. This event is applied on the target item.
Activated when user drops an item on a target item. This event is applied on the target item.
of the mouse on the edge.
Activated when user double clicks the
of the mouse on the edge.
Activated when the mouse enters the edge.
Activated while the mouse is moving inside the edge. It cannot be activated by keyboard.
Activated while the mouse moves out of the edge.
Activated when the mouse moves over the edge.
Activated when the mouse leaves the edge.
Activated when the left or right button is clicked down on the edge. It cannot be activated by keyboard.
Activated when the left or right button is released on the edge. It cannot be activated by keyboard.
Open the context menu when user clicks the right button of mouse on the edge.
of the mouse on the canvas.
Activated when user double clicks the
of the mouse on the canvas.
Activated when the mouse enters the canvas.
Activated while the mouse is moving inside the canvas. It cannot be activated by keyboard.
Activated while the mouse moves out of the canvas.
Activated when the mouse moves over the canvas.
Activated when the mouse leaves the canvas.
Activated when the left or right button is clicked down on the canvas. It cannot be activated by keyboard.
Activated when the left or right button is released on the canvas. It cannot be activated by keyboard.
Open the context menu when user clicks the right button of mouse on the canvas.
Activated when user begins to drag the canvas. This event is applied on the dragged canvas.
Activated during the dragging process on the canvas. This event is applied on the dragged canvas.
Activated when user stops dragging on the canvas. This event is applied on the dragged canvas.
Activated when user drags the canvas into a target item. This event is applied on the target item.
Activated when user drags the canvas out of a target item. This event is applied on the target item.

The callback paramters are different from custom events.
